Literature and Fiction.description: A dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian regime and its impact on a man's life.

Literature and Fiction.title: War and Peace
Literature and Fiction.description: A historical novel exploring society, war, and peace during the Napoleonic era.

Literature and Fiction.description: A novel exploring themes of love, infidelity, and societal norms in 19th-century Russia.

Literature and Fiction.title: Murder on the Orient Express
Literature and Fiction.description: A detective novel featuring Hercule Poirot solving a murder mystery on a train.

Literature and Fiction.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes

Literature and Fiction.title: The Da Vinci Code
Literature and Fiction.description: A mystery thriller novel exploring a symbologist's quest for the Holy Grail.

Literature and Fiction.title: Angels and Demons

Literature and Fiction.title: The Adventures of Miss Marple
Literature and Fiction.description: A collection of mystery short stories featuring the detective Miss Marple.

Literature and Fiction.title: The Name of the Rose
Literature and Fiction.description: A historical mystery novel set in an Italian monastery during the 14th century.

Literature and Fiction.title: Gorky Park
Literature and Fiction.description: A crime novel featuring Arkady Renko, a Moscow police investigator.

Literature and Fiction.title: Child 44
Literature and Fiction.description: A thriller novel set in the Stalinist Soviet Union, following a series of gruesome murders.

Literature and Fiction.title: The Man in the High Castle
Literature and Fiction.description: An alternate history novel depicting a world where the Axis powers won World War II.

Literature and Fiction.title: The Secret Speech

Literature and Fiction.title: The Winter Queen

Literature and Fiction.title: Master and Margarita
Literature and Fiction.description: A satirical novel intertwining an encounter between the Devil and Soviet society.

Literature and Fiction.title: Doctor Zhivago
Literature and Fiction.description: A romantic novel set during the Russian Revolution and its aftermath.

Literature and Fiction.title: The Red Tent

Literature and Fiction.title: The Gulag Archipelago
Literature and Fiction.description: A three-volume work exposing the Soviet forced labor camp system.

Literature and Fiction.title: One Day in the Life of Ivan Denisovich

Literature and Fiction.title: Eugene Onegin
Literature and Fiction.description: A novel in verse exploring themes of love, society, and boredom in 19th-century Russia.

Literature and Fiction.title: Ruslan and Ludmila
Literature and Fiction.description: An epic fairy tale poem, a romantic adventure featuring magical elements.

Literature and Fiction.title: Gone with the Wind
Literature and Fiction.description: The story is set in Clayton County and Atlanta, both in Georgia, during the American Civil War and Reconstruction Era

Literature and Fiction.title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
Literature and Fiction.description: A classic novel depicting the adventures of a young boy in a Mississippi River town.

Literature and Fiction.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
Literature and Fiction.description: A science fiction series following the misadventures of an unwitting human and his alien friend.

Literature and Fiction.title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
Literature and Fiction.description: A mystery novel narrated by a teenage boy with Asperger's syndrome.

Literature and Fiction.description: Its plot follows characters attempting to obtain jewelry hidden in a chair

Literature and Fiction.description: Volka, a 12-year-old Soviet Young Pioneer, discovers an ancient vessel at the bottom of a river. When he opens it, a genie emerges.

Literature and Fiction.title: Around the World in Eighty Days
Literature and Fiction.description: Phileas Fogg of London and his newly employed French valet Passepartout attempt to circumnavigate the world in 80 day.

Literature and Fiction.title: Karlson on the Roof
Literature and Fiction.description: When Midge looks out of his window, he hears a faint buzzing sound and sees Karlson, a little fat man, flying slowly past with a propellor on his back. Midge learns that he lives on the roof and has all kinds of interesting ideas and tricks

Literature and Fiction.title: Gulliver`s Travels
Literature and Fiction.description: This book describes four remarkable journies of ship's surgeon Lemuel Gulliver, among them, one to the land of Lilliput, where six-inch-high inhabitants bicker over trivialities; and another to Brobdingnag, a land where giants reduce man to insignificance.

Literature and Fiction.title: The Jungle Book
Literature and Fiction.description: Most of the characters are animals such as Shere Khan the tiger and Baloo the bear, though a principal character is a boy called Mowgli, who is raised in the jungle by wolves.

Literature and Fiction.title: The Wizard of Oz
Literature and Fiction.description: Journey through the magical world of Oz with Dorothy and her friends

Literature and Fiction.title: The Adventures of Buratino
Literature and Fiction.description: Buratino is wooden toy who befriends other toys from a theatre owned by evil Karabas-Barabas. He decides to free them with the golden key given by Tortila the Tortoise.

Literature and Fiction.title: The Kite Runner
Literature and Fiction.description: A novel exploring friendship, betrayal, and redemption set in Afghanistan.

Business and Health.description: Unveils the psychology behind influence and persuasion, crucial skills in business and everyday interactions.

Business and Health.title: How to Win Friends and Influence People
Business and Health.description: Provides timeless advice on effective communication, relationship-building, and influencing people positively.

Business and Health.title: Eat Right 4 Your Type
Business and Health.description: Introduces the blood type diet concept, suggesting that blood type can influence dietary needs and health.

Business and Health.description: This cannabis cookbook features 65 high-end recipes for sweet and savory dishes as well as cocktails.

Business and Health.description: Explores the mind-body connection in understanding and healing back pain.

Business and Health.title: Many Lives, Many Masters
Business and Health.description: The True Story of a Prominent Psychiatrist, His Young Patient, and the Past-Life Therapy That Changed Both Their Lives.

Business and Health.title: How to Change Your Mind
Business and Health.description: Michael Pollan traces the eventful history of psychedelics, from Hofmann's first encounter with LSD to the first surge of research into the field, to the widespread

Business and Health.title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
Business and Health.description: Presents personal finance lessons based on the author's two 'dads' and their differing philosophies on money.

Business and Health.title: Thinking Strategically
Business and Health.description: Introduces the principles of game theory and how they can be applied to decision-making and strategy.

Business and Health.title: The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari
Business and Health.description: A motivational book that offers a step-by-step approach to living with greater courage, balance, abundance, and joy.

History and Biographies.title: Hebrew Bible - HaTanach
History and Biographies.description: Hebrew Bible comprising the sacred scriptures of Judaism.

History and Biographies.title: Mastering the Art of Soviet Cooking
History and Biographies.description: A memoir and history of Soviet Russia, exploring its culture and history through food.

History and Biographies.title: Fermat's Last Theorem
History and Biographies.description: A book about the theorem that remained unsolved for centuries and the eventual proof of Fermat's Last Theorem.

History and Biographies.title: The Black Swan
History and Biographies.description: Examines rare and unpredictable events that have a major impact and are difficult to predict.

History and Biographies.title: The Romanovs: 1613-1918
History and Biographies.description: Traces the history of the Romanov dynasty in Russia from its beginnings to its tragic end in 1918.

History and Biographies.title: Young Stalin
History and Biographies.description: A biography of Joseph Stalin, focusing on his early years and rise to power.

History and Biographies.title: Churchill: Walking with Destiny
History and Biographies.description: A biography of Winston Churchill, chronicling his life and leadership during critical times.

History and Biographies.title: A State at Any Cost: The Life of David Ben-Gurion
History and Biographies.description: A biography of David Ben-Gurion, the primary founder and the first Prime Minister of Israel.

History and Biographies.title: No Room for Small Dreams
History and Biographies.description: Autobiography of Shimon Peres, focusing on his visions and experiences as a prominent Israeli statesman.

History and Biographies.title: Bibi: My Story
History and Biographies.description: An autobiography of Benjamin Netanyahu, delving into his political career and beliefs.

History and Biographies.title: The Silk Roads
History and Biographies.description: Explores the historical and contemporary significance of the Silk Road trade routes.

History and Biographies.title: The New Silk Roads
History and Biographies.description: An updated exploration of the Silk Road concept in the 21st century, encompassing global geopolitics.

History and Biographies.title: Former People: The Final Days of the Russian Aristocracy
History and Biographies.description: Details the lives of the Russian aristocracy during the Russian Revolution and their subsequent fate.

History and Biographies.title: Working the Rough Stone: Freemasonry and Society in Eighteenth-century Russia
History and Biographies.description: Examines Freemasonry's historical and social influence in 18th-century Russia.

History and Biographies.title: Rasputin: Faith, Power, and the Twilight of the Romanovs
History and Biographies.description: Biography of Grigori Rasputin, a mystic and advisor to the Romanov family in late Imperial Russia.

History and Biographies.description: A biography of Vladimir Putin, exploring his rise to power and his impact on Russia and the world.

History and Biographies.title: A Place Among the Nations
History and Biographies.description: Examines Israel's foreign policy and its challenges in the context of the Middle East.

History and Biographies.title: The Code Book
History and Biographies.description: Explores the history and science of codes and code-breaking, covering their impact on society and technology.

History and Biographies.title: Jerusalem: The Biography
History and Biographies.description: Presents a biography of the city of Jerusalem, covering its history, religious significance, and political importance.

History and Biographies.title: Big Bang
History and Biographies.description: Explores the history and concepts of the Big Bang theory, a fundamental idea in astrophysics.

History and Biographies.title: The Templar Revelation
History and Biographies.description: Discusses the history and mysteries surrounding the Knights Templar and their role in Christianity.

History and Biographies.title: Einstein: His Life and Universe
History and Biographies.description: A biography of Albert Einstein, exploring his life, scientific contributions, and impact on the world.

History and Biographies.title: The Jewish War
History and Biographies.description: An account of the Jewish revolt against Rome, written by ancient historian Flavius Josephus.

History and Biographies.title: Stalin: The Court of the Red Tsar
History and Biographies.description: A biography of Joseph Stalin, focusing on his personal and political life.

History and Biographies.title: The Oligarchs
History and Biographies.description: Examines the rise of oligarchs in post-Soviet Russia and their impact on the country.
